summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The get_AvailableTVFormats method retrieves the analog video standards (NTSC/M, PAL/B, SECAM/K1, and so on) supported by the encoder.

param.name: lAnalogVideoStandard
param.para: Specifies a pointer to a enumeration and the available formats have been combined in this integer with a bitwise OR.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The get_CCEnable determines whether closed captioning on the encoder is currently enabled.

param.name: lCCEnable
param.para: Specifies a pointer to a long integer to receive the current status of closed captioning on the encoder.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The get_CopyProtection method determines whether copy protection is currently enabled on the encoder.

param.name: lVideoCopyProtection
param.para: Specifies a pointer to a long integer to receive the current copy protection level, as defined in the enumeration.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The get_TVFormat method retrieves the analog video standard that the encoder is currently set to (NTSC/M, PAL/B, SECAM/K1, and so on).

param.name: plAnalogVideoStandard
param.para: Specifies a pointer to a long integer to receive the encoder's current video standard.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Possible values and their meaning are defined in the enumeration.

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The put_CCEnable method enables or disables closed captioning.

param.name: lCCEnable
param.para: Specifies whether closed captioning is on or off as a long integer.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The put_CopyProtection method sets the level of copy protection for the encoder.

param.name: lVideoCopyProtection
param.para: Specifies the level of copy protection as a long integer with a value as defined in the enumeration.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Note The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface is deprecated.
The put_TVFormat method sets the encoder to a particular analog video standard (NTSC/M, PAL/B, SECAM/K1, and so on).

param.name: lAnalogVideoStandard
param.para: Specifies the video standard to set in the encoder as a enumeration.

returns.para: When this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Note This interface has been deprecated.
Note Microsoft does not provide an implementation of this interface. Third parties might implement it.
The IAMAnalogVideoEncoder interface might be implemented by a hardware video encoder in video capture operations when an application is streaming data to disk and sending it back out to videotape.
